elements.title: Nuveen
elements.description: Nuveen invest in the growth of businesses, real estate, farmland, forests and infrastructure

elements.title: Statkfraft
elements.description: Statkraft develop and operate renewable energy assets within hydropower, wind, solar, gas and biomass, supply district heating and buy and sell energy. [In the news March 2021](https://www.current-news.co.uk/news/statkraft-to-optimise-100mw-of-gore-street-battery-storage-in-northern-ireland) for optimising 100MW of [Gore Street](https://www.gsenergystoragefund.com/) battery storage in Northern Ireland

elements.title: Nrstor
elements.description: Canada based, Nrstor develop cost-effective, reliable energy storage projects that create energy cost savings and reduce environmental impact

elements.title: Powin
elements.description: Powin own or manage every step in the energy storage supply chain, born in '89 as a high-quality, high-volume contract manufacturing company with a large supplier network and relationship base in Asia. [In Feb 2021 has raised](https://www.greentechmedia.com/articles/read/powin-energy-raises-100m-to-compete-for-leadership-of-grid-storage-market) more than $100 million in equity investment

elements.title: Glennmont
elements.description: Glennmont Partners is one of Europe’s largest fund managers focusing exclusively on investment in clean energy infrastructure. In 2021, Glennmont was acquired by Nuveen, the investment management arm of TIAA.

elements.title: Gore Street
elements.description: GSF is London’s first listed energy storage fund, investing in assets across the UK and internationally.

elements.title: Fluence
elements.description: Fluence is the result of two industry powerhouses and pioneers in energy storage joining together to form a new company dedicated to innovating modern electric infrastructure. In January 2018, [Siemens](https://www.siemens.com/global/en/home/products/energy.html) and [AES](http://www.aes.com/home/default.aspx) launched Fluence. In Jan 2021 the Qatar Investment Authority is investing $125 million into them, [from TechCrunch](https://techcrunch.com/2020/12/30/fluence-the-energy-storage-systems-developer-is-now-worth-over-1-billion-after-qia-investment/)

elements.title: Gresham house
elements.description: Gresham House is a specialist alternative asset manager, listed on the London Stock Exchange’s Alternative Investment Market (AIM)

elements.title: Modo Energy
elements.description: Stay on top of the energy storage market. Asset benchmarking, live data, market reports, and news. All in one place. founded and funded by ex kiwi power people

elements.title: Graphene battery breakthrough
elements.description: The startup [Nanotech Energy](https://nanotechenergy.com/) claims to be “the world’s top supplier of graphene” and plans to release a non-flammable, environmentally friendly lithium battery that can charge “18 times faster than anything that is currently available on the market” — within the next year.

elements.title: aggregation is making storage a software business
elements.description: aggregation is making storage a software business

elements.title: program on energy storage
elements.description: New York State Energy Research and Development Authority has a program on energy storage , their report sent by GridMarket when registering on their website
